thread.title: Live: Sasikala calls for an emergency meeting of MLAs at her residence |Panneerselvam revolts against Sasikala |
thread.title_full: Live: Sasikala calls for an emergency meeting of MLAs at her residence |Panneerselvam revolts against Sasikala |

title: Live: Sasikala calls for an emergency meeting of MLAs at her residence |Panneerselvam revolts against Sasikala |
text: I will take back my resignation if party workers and people ask me to: O.Panneerselvam 12:03 AM At a meeting in Sasikala's place, the question of her becoming the CM came forward.I asked that how is this justified: Panneerselvam 12:01 AM I was given the CM post but was insulted continuously: Panneerselvam 12:01 AM When Amma was in hospital, she asked me to take over as CM: O.Panneerselvam 11:56 PM Tamil Nadu Governor won't go to Chennai tomorrow.Panneerselvam to remain interim CM until governor examines legal implications regarding Sasikala's appointment: Sources 11:54 PM Sasikala Natarajan will not be sworn in as Tamil Nadu CM on Wednesday: Sources 11:54 PM Tamil Nadu CM O.Panneerselvam pays homage to Jayalalithaa at her memorial on Marina Beach; sits in a meditation position with his eyes closed 11:52 PM
